formatDescription: BibTeX is reference management software, used for formatting lists of references, enabling the consistent citing of sources in a range of styles. It was created in 1985, and is written in WEB/ Pascal. Bib files are lists of entries, each one corresponding to a bibliographical item, for a example book or article.
provenanceCompoundName: Technische Informationsbibliothek (TIB) Hannover / Technische Informationsbibliothek (TIB) Hannover
formatProvenance:
07/22 (v.107)- added BOF sequence to improve DROID performance;11/23 (v.115)- tightened signature and updated support links in note field. Submitted by Brigham Young University.
08/11/23 v.115. Tightened signature.

internalSignatures.name: BibTeX Database File
internalSignatures.note: @, followed by one of these required tags: Article, Book, Booklet, Conference, Inbook, Incollection, Inproceedings, Manual, Mastersthesis, Misc, Phdthesis, Proceedings, Techreport, Unpublished, in all uppercase, all lowercase, or standard capitalized formats, then 0-40 bytes, then }.
